data.title: HOME
meta_keywords: realty income the monthly dividend company monthly dividends
data.meta_description: Realty Income is an S&P 500 company with the mission to invest in people and places to deliver dependable monthly dividends that increase over time.
data.text:
REAL ESTATE PARTNER TO THE WORLD’S LEADING COMPANIES

Realty Income (NYSE: O), an S&P 500 company, is real estate partner to the world's leading companies. Founded in 1969, we invest in diversified commercial real estate and have a portfolio of *#number-of-properties-rounded#* properties in all 50 U.S. states, the U.K. and six other countries in Europe. We are known as "The Monthly Dividend Company®," and have a mission to deliver stockholders dependable monthly dividends that grow over time. Since our founding, we have declared *#consecutive-common-stock-monthly-dividends#* consecutive monthly dividends and are a member of the S&P 500 Dividend Aristocrats® index, having increased our dividend for the last 30 consecutive years.

AN INDUSTRY LEADER

Realty Income’s CEO, Sumit Roy, recently spoke with Jim Cramer on CNBC’s Mad Money. Sumit provided an update on the company’s operating performance and discussed our track record of dependable monthly dividends. Realty Income has a number of stakeholders, including investors, clients and employees. We are dedicated to making a positive impact on these constituencies, our communities and the commercial real estate industry as a whole.

VIEW OUR MEDIA LIBRARY

A TRACK RECORD OF SUCCESS

Realty Income believes in transparency. We operate under the highest ethical standards and work tirelessly to provide long-term value to all stakeholders. Since our public listing in 1994, we have delivered compound average annual total shareholder return of *#compound-average-annual-total-shareholder-return#*, outperforming the US REIT sector and the S&P 500 during that timeframe. Our business track record has been cultivated through the ownership of high-quality commercial assets leased to industry-leading operators under long-term net lease agreements.

STRONG RETURNS

See our latest results

Realty Income is committed to providing attractive risk-adjusted total shareholder return and monthly income through an increasing monthly dividend.

A CHANGING ENVIRONMENT

We are committed to promoting sustainable practices and creating shared value through an innovative approach to our business, which can improve the company’s overall risk profile as well as create market opportunities.

CAREERS

Learn more

Relationships are the cornerstone of our business. Our philosophy centers on celebrating differences, embracing equality and creating an inclusive environment.

VALUES

Learn more

Since our founding, we have been driven by a desire to serve and help others, with a special focus on bringing financial security and stability to individuals, families and communities.
